head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHUSTACK, BERNICE ''BUNNY'' (NEE ROCHKIND)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHUSTACK, BERNICE ''BUNNY'' (NEE ROCHKIND)

block.p: SCHUSTACK--Bernice ''Bunny'' (nee Rochkind) 79 of East Northport, NY on Friday, January 12, 2007. Wife of William D.; mother of Susan Frankel and Amy Schustack; sister of Michael Rochkind; grandmother of David and Leora Frankel. Service 9:30 AM, Monday, at Mount Sinai Memorial Chapels, East Brunswick, NJ. For directions please visit www.msmc.us. Burial New Mount Carmel Cemetery, Glendale, NY.
